data.name: Eden's Last Sunrise Demo
data.detailed_description:
The Eden's Last Sunrise Battle Demo offers a small tase of what to expect from the full experience of Eden's Last Sunrise. The demo is a standalone experience separate from the main game.

  • Create your own custom character to participate in battle alongside the main cast! Choose their name and species, design their outfit, and even import your own artwork for their battle portrait.
  • Play a basic battle (4v4) on a small map, or an advanced battle (6v6) on a larger map with more advanced classes.
  • Adjustable difficulty settings and a quick tutorial that guides you through the basics.
data.about_the_game:
The Eden's Last Sunrise Battle Demo offers a small tase of what to expect from the full experience of Eden's Last Sunrise. The demo is a standalone experience separate from the main game.

  • Create your own custom character to participate in battle alongside the main cast! Choose their name and species, design their outfit, and even import your own artwork for their battle portrait.
  • Play a basic battle (4v4) on a small map, or an advanced battle (6v6) on a larger map with more advanced classes.
  • Adjustable difficulty settings and a quick tutorial that guides you through the basics.
data.short_description: A classic tactics RPG where magic and technology clash to determine the fate of the world. Try the demo and experience a taste of tactical combat with a twist.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WindowsÂ® 7 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: SSE2 or better, 64-bit architecture
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: At least DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11, at least 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2300 MB available space
